name: Skyrider Sword
r1: Using an Elemental Burst grants a 12% increase in Base ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.
r2: Using an Elemental Burst grants a 15% increase in Base ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.
r3: Using an Elemental Burst grants an 18% increase in Base ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.
r4: Using an Elemental Burst grants a 21% increase in Base ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.
r5: Using an Elemental Burst grants a 24% increase in Base ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.
